Package com.mediLaboSolutions.T2D2Authentication.controller

Class PractitionerController

java.lang.Object
com.mediLaboSolutions.T2D2Authentication.controller.PractitionerController
@RestController public class PractitionerController extends Object
A class that receives requests made from some of the usual CRUD endpoints and specific URL for the Practitioner.
Version:
1.0
Author:
SÃ©bastien Cappon
Singularity :
Some responses are filtered using JsonView to match the response pattern desired by the front-end.

  • Method Details

    • getPractitioners

      @GetMapping("/practitioners") public List<Practitioner> getPractitioners()
      A GetMapping method on the /practitioners URI. It calls the eponymous IPractitionerService method and returns a list of Practitioner model entities.
      Returns:
      A Practitioner list.
      Singularity :
      Method created for testing purposes with Postman. Could be use for administration.

    • getPractitionerById

      @GetMapping("/practitioners/{practitionerId}") public Practitioner getPractitionerById(@PathVariable("practitionerId") int practitionerId)
      A GetMapping method on the /practitioners URI with a practitioner id as PathVariable. It calls the eponymous IPractitionerService method and returns the Practitioner model entity whose id is the one passed in parameter.
      Returns:
      A Practitioner.
      Front-end calling method(s) :
      auth.service.ts : getPractitionerById(practitionerId: number)

    • connectPractitionerWithEmailAndPassword

      @PostMapping("/login") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Practitioner> connectPractitionerWithEmailAndPassword(@RequestBody PractitionerLoginDto practitionerLoginDto) throws Exception
      A PostMapping method on the /login URI with a DTO, consisting of the active user email and non-hashed password, as RequestBody. It calls the eponymous IPractitionerService method and returns the Practitioner added with status code 200. If the result is null, it returns status code 400.
      Returns:
      A Practitioner and a status code.
      Throws:
      Exception
      Front-end calling method(s) :
      auth.service.ts : login(authValue: AuthValue)
      JsonView(s) :
      Display id, lastname and firstname for the involved Practitioner model entities.

    • createPractitioner

      @PostMapping("/practitioner") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Practitioner> createPractitioner(@RequestBody Practitioner newPractitioner) throws Exception
      A PostMapping method on the /practitioner URI with a Practitioner model entity as RequestBody. It calls the eponymous IPractitionerService method and returns the Practitioner added with status code 201. If the result is null, it returns status code 400.
      Returns:
      A Practitioner and a status code.
      Throws:
      Exception
      Front-end calling method(s) :
      new-account.service.ts : createNewAccount(newPractitionerValue: NewPractitionerValue)

    • updatePractitionerById

      @PutMapping("/practitioners/{practitionerId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Integer> updatePractitionerById(@PathVariable("practitionerId") int practitionerId, @RequestBody Practitioner updatedPractitioner) throws Exception
      A PutMapping method on the /practitioners URI with a practitioner id as PathVariables and a Practitioner as RequestBody. It calls the eponymous IPractitionerService method and returns an Integer used by the front end to determine the success of the request, with status code 200. If the result is null, it returns status code 400.
      Returns:
      An Integer and a status code.
      Throws:
      Exception
      Singularity :
      Method created for testing purposes with Postman. Could be use for administration.

    • deletePractitionerById

      @DeleteMapping("/practitioners/{practitionerId}") public void deletePractitionerById(@PathVariable("practitionerId") int practitionerId)
      A DeleteMapping method on the /practitioners URI with the a practitioner id as PathVariables. It calls the eponymous IPractitionerService method and returns nothing.
      Singularity :
      Method created for testing purposes with Postman. Could be use for administration.
